name: HTML EMULATORS
description:
This is an interface i made to share online emulators of old pc and consoles. I invite you publish new emulators links in the comments area to amplify the program in the next future. Any suggestion is well accepted.

I am not responsible for the content of the related sites found in the links, I have simply programmed an interface that connects to the various sites but the sites are not owned by me.

This free software is released under :

https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html
